name: tpelgatowavelink
description: Touch Portal Plugin for Elgato Wave Link

scripts.build: npm run pkg:win && npm run gen:entry && node scripts/build.js
scripts.concat: concat-cli -f lib/wavelink/ELGEvents.js -f lib/wavelink/WaveLinkAction.js -f lib/wavelink/SetMonitorMixOutput.js -f lib/wavelink/ToggleMonitorMixOutput.js -f lib/wavelink/SwitchMonitoring.js -f lib/wavelink/SwitchProfile.js -f lib/wavelink/AdjustVolumeMixer.js -f lib/wavelink/SetVolumeMixer.js -f lib/wavelink/AdjustVolumeMonitor.js -f lib/wavelink/SetVolumeMonitor.js -f lib/wavelink/MixerMute.js -f lib/wavelink/MonitorMute.js -f lib/wavelink/SetMicrophoneSettings.js -f lib/wavelink/WaveLinkClient.js -f lib/wavelink/index.js -o src/bundle.js

author: Matt Aitchison
